keyMoments.title: Shopping with Chimney
keyMoments.description: Sanji goes shopping in Water 7 with Chimney and Gonbe, who convince him to visit a special cook.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Sanji's encounter with Banban and the discovery of Aqua Laguna salt.

keyMoments.title: Tasting Banban's Cooking
keyMoments.description: Sanji tastes Banban's fried rice and is amazed by its incredible flavor, becoming determined to discover the secret ingredient.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Sanji's dedication to culinary excellence and drives the episode's investigation plot.
keyMoments.quote: This taste... it's incredible! What's the secret?

keyMoments.title: Learning of Banban and Zeff's Connection
keyMoments.description: Sanji learns that Banban was friends with his mentor Zeff in their younger years, and both shared the dream of finding the All Blue.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a meaningful connection between Sanji's past and present, reinforcing the importance of the All Blue dream.

keyMoments.title: Collecting Aqua Laguna Salt
keyMoments.description: Inspired by learning about the special salt that may come from the All Blue, Sanji collects a supply for cooking for his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Renews Sanji's belief in the All Blue and gives him a practical ingredient that symbolizes his dream.

relationships.description: Sanji meets Banban, an old chef friend of his mentor Zeff, and learns about special cooking ingredients.

evolutionMoments.description: Sanji meets Banban and learns about his connection to Zeff and the Aqua Laguna salt.

reveals.information: Sanji's belief in the All Blue is renewed through discovering salt that potentially comes from all the world's seas

keyMoments.title: Banban's Debut
keyMoments.description: An elderly chef operating a small floating restaurant in Water 7, Banban is introduced as a seemingly drunk but highly skilled cook.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a new character who will teach Sanji about special ingredients and reveal a connection to Zeff.

keyMoments.title: Connection to Zeff Revealed
keyMoments.description: Banban shows Sanji a photograph proving he was friends with Zeff in their younger days, when both pursued the dream of finding the All Blue.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Banban as part of the larger One Piece world and creates a meaningful link to Sanji's mentor.

keyMoments.title: Teaching About All Blue Salt
keyMoments.description: Banban explains that the special Aqua Laguna salt may come from the All Blue itself, as the storm carries water from all the world's seas.
keyMoments.significance: Provides lore about the All Blue and gives Sanji renewed hope in his dream.
keyMoments.quote: This salt comes from the Aqua Laguna, which carries water from all the world's seas. Perhaps it comes from the All Blue itself.

abilities.description: Banban possesses exceptional culinary skills, able to create dishes with extraordinary flavor using the special Aqua Laguna salt.

relationships.description: Banban and Zeff were friends in their younger years, both pursuing the dream of finding the All Blue.

evolutionMoments.description: Banban reveals through a photograph that he was friends with Zeff when both were younger.

relationships.description: Banban meets Sanji and teaches him about the Aqua Laguna salt, sharing knowledge as a fellow cook and friend of Sanji's mentor.

evolutionMoments.description: Sanji meets Banban and learns about his cooking techniques and connection to Zeff.

reveals.information: Banban was friends with Zeff and both pursued the dream of finding the All Blue
Banban uses special Aqua Laguna salt to create exceptionally flavorful dishes
Despite appearing drunk and disheveled, Banban is a skilled chef with a lecherous personality similar to Sanji

keyMoments.title: Taking Sanji to Banban
keyMoments.description: Chimney convinces Sanji to visit her 'grandpa' Banban's restaurant, setting the episode's plot in motion.
keyMoments.significance: Chimney serves as the catalyst for Sanji's discovery of the Aqua Laguna salt and meeting Banban.

relationships.description: Chimney knows Banban and calls him 'grandpa', showing familiarity with the old chef.

evolutionMoments.description: Chimney brings Sanji to visit Banban's restaurant.
